title: The Writer's Almanac for Tuesday, February 8, 2022
description: Poet Elizabeth Bishop was born on this day in 1910. She published only 101 poems in her lifetime, and reworked her poem "The Moose" for 25 years.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Poet Elizabeth Bishop was born on this day in 1910. She published only 101 poems in her lifetime, and reworked her poem "The Moose" for 25 years.
